QuestData.Title: The Road to Fel
QuestData.Description: An early step to understanding how magic works is to understand and study materials made using that magic. That was how I made my breakthrough on warlock soul crystals, after all. $b$bThe wyrmtongue minions in this pit hammer plates into their structures for support and maintenance. Those will be a good starting point. Fetch me some, my faithful assistant!
QuestData.CompletionText: I can practically feel the buildings hum with power.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. By studying these materials I can better understand how they imbue magic into their machinery and architecture.
